reviewText: I bought this from Wal-Mart.com. I think it must of been produced in the 1950s. The entire DVD is in black & white, even the people who narrate, (soldiers etc.), is B&W. The footage is quite hard to see. They tell some very interesting & dramatic stories though. One thing really surprised me though, former supreme allied commander, Dwight D. Eisenhower & General Omar Bradley are among the people who narrate, in actual interviews, along with a couple of fairly high ranking German officers.
